content.rendered:
Emerging Stylist Holly has been trained under the watchful eye of Reuben and Lillie where she has finely tuned her skills to become one of the most exciting young stylists we have.

Holly injects a youthful style to all her work, seamlessly working on her precise highlighting/balayage work to delivering uptown glamour styling for her burgeoning, loyal clientele. “I am obsessed with creating free-flowing, freehand balayage painting, where I can creatively place pops of colour to contour my clients cut – it’s like an art for me. I really love to colour from rich brunettes to soft balayage’s and will pick a tone to suit my clients personality and lifestyle”.

Holly is continually being educated in the most fashion-forward, up-to-date colouring and cut trends, and she looks forward to sharing them with the beautiful clients of Luxe.

Make a booking online or by calling (02) 9412 1244.
